#tidyverse library
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(rio)
library(reshape2)
library(cluster)
library(MASS) 
library(reshape2) 
library(reshape)

#Retrieve the data from my github
location='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jcargalb/543coursework/main/'
file='sounders.csv'
link=paste0(location,file)

sounders<-read.csv(link)

safeINS_long=melt(sounders,id.vars = sounders$Name)

base  = ggplot(safeINS_long, 
               aes(x = variable, 
                   y = value, 
                   group = city)) + #new
        geom_polygon(fill = 'green',
                     col='blue') 

plot1 = base + coord_polar()

plot2 = plot1 + facet_wrap(~city,# one plot per city
                           ncol = 10) # ten plot per row
plot2
